item.title: 降低消费税后，印度市场迎来强劲开局
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国太阳能制造商称陷入困境的行业迎来转折点
item.description: 据一家主要生产商称，中国的多晶硅行业与太阳能供应链的其他环节一样，一直在努力应对严重的产能过剩问题。【原文：China’s polysilicon sector, which along with the rest of the solar supply chain has been grappling with severe overcapacity, is at a clear turning point after recent meetings with the government to address the issue, according to a major producer.】

item.title: 特朗普请求美国最高法院支持其全球关税政策
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求美国最高法院支持他的全球关税政策，寻求对这起可能影响数万亿美元贸易的案件进行复审，并赋予他对世界经济的广泛新影响力。【原文：President Donald Trump asked the US Supreme Court to uphold his global tariffs, seeking review in a case that could affect trillions of dollars in trade and give him broad new leverage over the world economy.】

item.title: VPBank Securities 计划通过 IPO 筹集至少 1.72 亿美元资金
item.description: 越南繁荣股份公司（Vietnam Prosperity JSC Bank）旗下的越南繁荣银行证券股份公司（VPBank Securities JSC）计划在首次股票销售中筹集至少 4.55 万亿盾（约合 1.72 亿美元）的资金，最快将于本季度进行。【原文：VPBank Securities JSC, a unit of Vietnam Prosperity JSC Bank, plans to raise at least 4.55 trillion dong ($172 million) in an initial share sale that could take place as soon as this quarter.】

item.title: 印尼银行誓言分担负担将是有度的、透明的
item.description: 印尼央行保证，在与财政当局重新实施 "负担分摊 "计划时，将继续保持谨慎，维护市场纪律和诚信。【原文：The Indonesian central bank assured it would remain prudent and maintain market discipline and integrity in carrying out a renewed “burden-sharing” scheme with the fiscal authority.】

item.title: 日本赤泽在参谋级会谈取得进展后前往美国
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世启程前往美国参加部长级会谈，此前有关 7 月贸易协议的低层次讨论已基本结束；这表明双方在执行协议方面正在取得进展。【原文：Japan’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa left for the US for ministerial talks, after lower-level discussions on the July trade deal largely wrapped up — an indication that the two sides are making progress on implementing the agreement.】

item.title: 印度印度银行新任首席执行官在改革中寻求降低风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度印度银行有限公司（IndusInd Bank Ltd. ）的新任首席执行官正在迅速采取行动，降低其贷款风险，因为在这家印度贷款公司出现一系列治理失误之后，他正努力恢复投资者的信心。【原文：IndusInd Bank Ltd.’s new chief is moving quickly to reduce risks on its loan book, according to people familiar with the matter, as he seeks to restore investor confidence after a series of governance lapses at the Indian lender.】

item.title: 数十亿美元交易推动印度并购活动回升
item.description: 在经历了今年早些时候的低迷之后，印度的并购活动在数十亿美元跨境交易以及全球私募股权基金和本地公司的参与带动下有所回升。【原文：After a lull earlier this year, activity in mergers and acquisitions has picked up in India, led by multibillion dollar cross-border deals and the involvement of global private equity funds and local firms.】

item.title: 壳牌和英国石油公司在印尼的加油站因进口限制而枯竭
item.description: 由于进口限制导致燃料供应不足，壳牌（Shell Plc）和英国石油公司（BP Plc）在印尼的加油站出现燃料短缺。【原文：Shell Plc- and BP Plc-branded gas stations in Indonesia have run low on fuel as supplies are curbed by import restrictions.】

item.title: 据说 GTCR 正在探讨竞购 Hellman & Friedman 的 SimpliSafe 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 GTCR 正在考虑竞购 Hellman & Friedman 旗下的住宅安全公司 SimpliSafe。【原文：Buyout firm GTCR is weighing a bid for Hellman & Friedman’s residential security company SimpliSafe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚家庭消费因服务业支出而加速增长
item.description: 由于服务业增长强劲，澳大利亚家庭支出在 7 月份加速增长，这增强了人们对储备银行将在本月晚些时候维持利率不变的预期。【原文：Australia’s household spending accelerated in July on strong growth in services, reinforcing expectations the Reserve Bank will keep interest rates unchanged later this month.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行叫停 Banco Master 出售计划
item.description: 巴西中央银行拒绝了 Banco Master SA 收购 Banco de Brasilia SA 的交易，这使得这家陷入困境的贷款机构在寻求新资本时几乎没有任何选择。【原文：Brazil’s central bank rejected Banco Master SA’s acquisition by Banco de Brasilia SA, leaving the troubled lender with few options as it looks for fresh capital.】

item.title: 日本股市因债市平静和美国科技股提振而反弹
item.description: 日本股市上涨，银行股和科技股走强，原因是全球债券收益率暂停跳升，有助于市场情绪，美国科技股反弹也提振了电子产品。【原文：Japanese stocks rose, with banks and tech strong, as a pause in the jump in global bond yields helped sentiment and a rebound in US tech stocks boosted electronics.】

item.title: 关税谈判接近尾声，智利总统团队要求保持冷静
item.description: 就在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的谈判接近尾声之际，智利最高级别的总统竞选活动誓言要以冷静的头脑应对中美之间的贸易竞争，并深化与两国的关系。【原文：Chile’s top presidential campaigns vowed to navigate the trade rivalry between the US and China with a cool head and deepen ties with both nations, just as talks on tariffs imposed by Donald Trump near an end.】

item.title: 郑志刚从家族投资公司辞职
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co., Ltd.）前首席执行官郑志刚（Adrian Cheng）辞去了周大福企业有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd.）董事一职，这标志着郑志刚进一步退出了与其家族长期关联的商业帝国。【原文：Adrian Cheng, former chief executive officer of New World Development Co., has stepped down as a director of the closely held Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd., marking a further retreat from the business empire long associated with his lineage.】

item.title: 中国考虑抑制股票投机，促进股市稳步上涨
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国金融监管机构正在考虑采取一系列股市降温措施，因为他们对股市自 8 月初以来 1.2 万亿美元的上涨速度越来越担忧。【原文：China’s financial regulators are considering a number of cooling measures for the stock market as they grow concerned about the speed of a $1.2 trillion rally since the start of August, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Instagram 式的小红书在金沙江书局创下 310 亿美元的价值
item.description: 在最近通过一家大型基金进行的交易中，小红书的估值在短短三个月内飙升了 19%，达到 310 亿美元，这凸显了投资者对中国版 Instagram 的强烈需求。【原文：Xiaohongshu’s valuation surged 19% to $31 billion in just three months during recent transactions via a major fund, underscoring the intense investor demand for a Chinese-equivalent to Instagram.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 16 岁以下儿童禁令临近，Meta、TikTok 被告知做好准备
item.description: 澳大利亚网络安全监管机构已通知 Meta Platforms Inc.、谷歌、TikTok Inc.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., Google, TikTok Inc. and other digital platforms have been told by Australia’s online safety regulator to prepare now for the country’s social-media ban for under-16s — three months out from when the law comes into force.】

item.title: BMV 负责人预计将有更多墨西哥公司在美国双重上市
item.description: 墨西哥证券交易所（Bolsa Mexicana de Valores）首席执行官豪尔赫-阿莱格里亚-福莫索（Jorge Alegria Formoso）表示，寻求上市的墨西哥公司越来越多地探讨在本国和美国上市的想法。【原文：Mexican companies looking to go public are increasingly exploring the idea of listing in both their home country and the US, according to Jorge Alegria Formoso, chief executive officer of the Bolsa Mexicana de Valores.】

item.title: Miyasaki 辞职，Blackstone 对亚洲房地产部进行整顿
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正在对其亚洲房地产部门的高级管理层进行改革，因为其长期任职的收购部门主管即将离职。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is revamping the senior management at its Asia real estate unit as its long-serving head of acquisitions is set to leave, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: KKR、阿波罗推动私人投资涌入亚洲学校
item.description: 随着对优质教育的需求不断增长，投资者希望从中获利，因此私人资金正不断涌入亚洲的学校。【原文：Private money is pouring into schools in Asia as investors seek to turn a profit on the growing demand for quality education.】

item.title: 日本电产股价因不当会计调查暴跌 22
item.description: 日本电产株式会社（Nidec Corp. ）宣布成立第三方委员会调查不当会计行为，该公司股价暴跌 22%，创下历史最高纪录。【原文：Nidec Corp.’s shares plunged 22%, the most on record, after the Japanese electronics components company announced that it has set up a third-party committee to investigate improper accounting.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"供应担忧和美国经济放缓迹象导致石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于交易商担心 "欧佩克+"可能会增加供应，美国数据显示经济放缓，以及行业估计显示一个关键储存中心的库存增加，石油在一个月来最大跌幅后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after falling by the most in a month as traders fretted that OPEC+ may boost supplies, US data pointed to a slowdown, and an industry estimate showed higher stockpiles at a key storage hub.】

item.title: 纳斯达克修订小型 IPO 和中国企业上市规则
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc. ）正在修改小型首次公开募股公司上市和继续在其交易所交易必须遵守的规则，这是纳斯达克为保护投资者免受市场剧烈波动影响和提高流动性所做的最新努力。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is revamping rules that companies pursuing small initial public offerings must follow to list and continue to be traded on its exchanges, the latest effort to protect investors from wild swings in the market and improve liquidity.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长称，澳大利亚消费强劲可能会减缓降息步伐
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）表示，随着可支配收入和财富的攀升，澳大利亚消费者开始增加支出，这对经济是一个可喜的推动，如果货币宽松政策持续下去，可能会放缓步伐。【原文：Australian consumers are starting to spend more as disposable incomes and wealth climb, a welcome boost for the economy that could slow the pace of monetary easing if it persists, according to Reserve Bank Governor Michele Bullock.】

item.title: 全球财政风险上升，日本面临艰难的 30 年期债券销售
item.description: 日本周四的 30 年期国债拍卖面临着全球债务市场动荡和国内政局不稳带来的更多不确定性，这再次引发了人们对日本财政前景的担忧。【原文：Japan’s 30-year government bond auction Thursday faces added uncertainty from global debt market turmoil and political instability at home which has reignited concerns over the country’s fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯的损害控制预算引发英国经济增长担忧
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）说，增长是解决英国经济问题的办法。在 11 月 26 日的预算中，她面临着不得不扼杀增长的前景。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves says growth is the solution to Britain’s economic problems. At her budget on Nov. 26, she faces the prospect of having to kill it.】

item.title: 研究称，英国合伙企业税可为里夫斯带来 19 亿英镑收入
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）试图填补公共财政中的一个黑洞，她提出了一项建议，即取消对商业合伙关系的过时减免，从而每年从律师、会计师和金融家那里筹集 19 亿英镑（约合 26 亿美元）的资金。【原文：The UK could raise £1.9 billion ($2.6 billion) a year from lawyers, accountants and financiers by removing an outdated relief for business partnerships, according to a proposal that could help Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves as she seeks to fill a black hole in the public finances.】

item.title: 中国股市和人民币反弹激发良性反馈循环的希望
item.description: 中国股市的飙升激起了对人民币的看涨情绪，从而引发了一种良性循环的前景，即一种资产类别的收益增强了另一种资产类别的信心。【原文：A surge in Chinese equities is stoking bullish sentiment toward the yuan, raising prospects of a virtuous cycle where gains in one asset class reinforce confidence in the other.】

item.title: 新加坡滚雪球般增长的现金水平推动了当地债券的发展
item.description: 最近新加坡货币市场上现金的增加加强了对该国债券的需求，使其回报率接近该地区的最高水平。【原文：The recent build-up of cash in Singapore’s money market is strengthening demand for the nation’s bonds, driving returns to near the highest in the region.】
